name: Dead Fish Pinball
description:
Hi, this is my contribution to the Gamedev.js Jam 2022 with the theme "RAW".

To fire a fish press "Enter", "Space" or "Gamepad A". (Mobile Users can touch the bottom of the screen) 

To move the left arm press "A", "Left Arrow" or "Gamepad LT". (Mobile users can touch the left side of the screen) 

To move the right arms press "L", "Right Arrow" or "Gamepad RT". (Mobile users can touch the right side of the screen) 

For the pause menu press "Escape" or "Gamepad Start" 

For Multifish lock 3 fish in the cave at the top!

Tested in Chrome and Firefox
